displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.
displayProperties.name: Classified

displayProperties.name: Classified

displayProperties.description: The formerly two-faced Fallen now serves as a faithful guide on Europa for Guardians and Light-bound Eliksni alike.
displayProperties.name: Eliksni Rebel

displayProperties.description: The Morning Star has crashed and the spoils amongst the wreckage are now yours to take… for a price.
displayProperties.name: Spoils of the Morning Star

displayProperties.description: Burdened with the knowledge one can only gain from time travel, the Stranger is here to divert us from an inescapable dark future.
displayProperties.name: A Link to the Future

displayProperties.description: A skilled Hunter, Shaw leads fireteams on dangerous missions throughout the solar system.
displayProperties.name: Vanguard Operative

displayProperties.description: Kiosk to acquire old or abandoned quests.
displayProperties.name: Quest Archive

displayProperties.description: Built in honor of those who sacrificed their Light to defend humanity. Created in collaboration with Cryptarchs to help Guardians manage armaments.
displayProperties.name: Memorial

displayProperties.description: Advanced Prototype Exo and warden of the Black Armory.
displayProperties.name: Armor Synthesis

displayProperties.description: Atheon has been destroyed. Thanks to you, Kabr's spirit lives on, and his spoils are yours to take… for a price.
displayProperties.name: Spoils of the Vault

displayProperties.description: Compete in the Dares of Eternity to earn Strange Favor. Rank up to earn various rewards. Your rank can be reset up to {var:365343461} more times.
displayProperties.name: Purveyor of Strange Goods

displayProperties.description: Eternal Equine
displayProperties.name: Eternal Equine

displayProperties.description: A Hive Ghost who no longer believes the Hive deserve the Light, Fynch has defected from Savathûn's followers in order to help humanity.
displayProperties.name: Conscientious Objector

displayProperties.description: The disciple's Glaive, harbinger of ruin for eons, now lies still, ready for your communion.
displayProperties.name: Remnant of the Disciple

displayProperties.description: Oryx, the Taken King, sovereign of the Osmium Throne, God-King of the Hive, and master of the Taken, now rests in the void of space.
displayProperties.name: Remnant of Oryx

displayProperties.description: The Hidden's hub for intel on any and all Enclave investigations.
displayProperties.name: Investigatory Apparatus

displayProperties.description: The scythe of infinite nightmares lies before you awaiting your cooperation.
displayProperties.name: Residuum of the Disciple

displayProperties.description: The latest recruit in a long line of cybernetically enhanced protectors of Neomuna.
displayProperties.name: Cloud Strider

displayProperties.description: Data Architect Extraordinaire
displayProperties.name: City Archivist

displayProperties.description: Explore Strand and the power it has to offer.
displayProperties.name: Meditative Focal Point

displayProperties.description: No longer an outfitter for heroes of the Tower, Eva now devotes her time to making sure Guardians enjoy seasonal events.
displayProperties.name: Event Vendor

displayProperties.description: Event Vendor
displayProperties.name: Courtyard, the Last City

displayProperties.description: Complete Defiant Battleground activities to increase your War Table reputation.
displayProperties.name: Vanguard Operations

displayProperties.description: Devrim Kay stands watch in the EDZ, protecting the small group of people who now call the Farm their home.
displayProperties.name: Clan Steward

displayProperties.description: Compete in the Crucible. Earn armor and weapons at each rank, and powerful upgrades at major ranks.
displayProperties.name: The Crucible

displayProperties.description: Skilled historians and cryptographers, the Cryptarchs are always happy to decrypt a challenging engram for Guardians.
displayProperties.name: Cryptarchs

displayProperties.description: Devrim Kay stands watch in the EDZ, protecting the small group of people who now call the Farm their home.
displayProperties.name: Dead Zone Scout

displayProperties.description: Tess Everis sells curios and accessories from her stylish boutique in the Tower.
displayProperties.name: Eververse

displayProperties.description: Dismantle weapons and complete Gunsmith bounties to increase your Reputation Rank with Banshee-44.
displayProperties.name: Gunsmith

displayProperties.description: Ikora Rey oversees the Vanguard's research and intelligence operations. Guardians and scholars seek her mentorship from far and wide.
displayProperties.name: Vanguard Research

displayProperties.description: Compete in the Iron Banner. Earn armor and weapons at each rank and powerful upgrades at major ranks.
A Golden Age AI marooned on  Nessus, Failsafe stands watch over the wreckage of her ship.
displayProperties.name: Exodus Black AI

displayProperties.description: Enigmatic and reclusive, the Nine appear to take an interest in the affairs of Guardians.
displayProperties.name: The Nine

displayProperties.description: The postmaster handles deliveries destined for residents of the Tower, including lost items.
displayProperties.name: Postmaster

displayProperties.description: Emperor Calus of the Cabal seeks champions.
displayProperties.name: Leviathan

displayProperties.description: Shipwright to the Tower, Amanda Holliday runs the Hangar like a finely tuned engine.
displayProperties.name: Chief Shipwright

displayProperties.description: Enigmatic and reclusive, the Nine appear to take an interest in the affairs of Guardians.
displayProperties.name: The Nine

displayProperties.description: Complete strikes and Battlegrounds. Earn armor and weapons at each rank, and powerful upgrades at major ranks.
displayProperties.name: Vanguard Tactical

displayProperties.description: Brother Vance leads the Followers of Osiris on Mercury, studying the life and teachings of Osiris and standing watch over the Infinite Forest.
displayProperties.name: Follower of Osiris

displayProperties.description: Ana Bray oversees operations in the Hellas Basin, and serves as a liaison between the Vanguard and Rasputin.
displayProperties.name: Voice of Rasputin

displayProperties.description: A warrior of the Reef, Petra Venj puts duty above all else.
displayProperties.name: Queen's Wrath

displayProperties.description: Compete in Gambit. Earn armor and weapons at each rank, and powerful upgrades at major ranks.
displayProperties.name: Rogue Lightbearer

displayProperties.description: An exclusive gathering of merchants that provide support to membership Guardians.
displayProperties.name: Mugunghwa Legion

displayProperties.description: An elite Golden Age weaponsmith
displayProperties.name: The Black Armory

displayProperties.description: A magnificent statue of Calus, generously placed here for worthy creatures to kneel before.
displayProperties.name: Visage of Calus

displayProperties.description: Once a Lightbearer, Eris Morn descended into the Hellmouth of the Moon where she lost her fireteam, her Ghost, and her Light to the Hive.
displayProperties.name: Bane of the Swarm

displayProperties.description: A mechanism of the occult built by Eris Morn to harness even the most unstable of magics. Access the lectern to create gear using Nightmare Essences and collect bounties.
displayProperties.name: Bound with Blood

displayProperties.description: Countless unclear futures reverberate through your mind as you approach the obelisk. Strengthen the obelisk's bond to the Sundial by increasing its Resonance Rank.
displayProperties.name: Resonance Rank

displayProperties.description: Compete in Trials of Osiris. Earn armor, weapons, and powerful upgrades when you rank up.
displayProperties.name: Hero of Six Fronts

displayProperties.description: Countless unclear futures reverberate through your mind as you approach the obelisk. Strengthen the obelisk's bond to the Sundial by increasing its Resonance Rank.
displayProperties.name: Resonance Rank

displayProperties.name: Resonance Rank
